transcript: I wouldn't marry you again if you came to me on your offended knees. You're an even mind a little vampire I hope to God I never see you again as long as I live

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: I wouldn't marry you again if you came to me on your bended knees. You're a evil minded little vampire. I hope to God I never see you again as long as I live.
